name: The Plague (itch) (Maggiee)
description:
The Plague is a small 2D adventure game made in Bitsy during the week of Bitsy Game Jam (organized by Universidade Lusófona).

Game Description: Try to help the King and his Alchemist save the Kingdom from the horrible virus by finding the ingrediets to create a cure, but beward of this virus, just one touch might kill you.

Team:

António Duarte

João Inácio

Margarida Teles

Diogo Freire
